title: Services
subtitle: Manage service configurations
deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this service?
emptyStateDescription: No services found. Create one to get started.

execution.title: Test Service
execution.description: Upload a file and select a flavor to test this service
execution.selectFile: Select a file or drag and drop

errors.missingFields: Please select a file and flavor
errors.mustSelectInput: Select a file or synthetic template
errors.contextExceeded: Input exceeds context window ({inputTokens} tokens, {availableTokens} available)
errors.contextExceededNoFallback: Input exceeds context window and no iterative fallback available
errors.fallbackFlavorInactive: All potential fallback flavors are inactive

execution.fallbackDetails: Content exceeded context limit. Switched from "{original}" to "{fallback}".

syntheticTemplates.title: Synthetic Test Templates
syntheticTemplates.description: Select a pre-built conversation template for testing

typeDescriptions.generic: Generic LLM service for custom use cases

flavors.title: Flavors
flavors.taskPriorityDescription: Processing priority for workers. Lower values are processed first (0=urgent, 5=normal, 9=background).
flavors.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this flavor?
flavors.deleteWarning: Cannot delete the last flavor of a service.
flavors.emptyStateDescription: No flavors found. Add one to get started.
flavors.chunkingDescription: Control how conversation transcriptions are processed and batched for summarization.

description.single_pass: Process entire document in one LLM call. Fast but limited to shorter documents.
description.iterative: Process in batches with rolling context. Handles any length, progressive output. Enable 'Reduce Summary' to consolidate all batches at the end.

autoFallback.label: Auto-fallback to iterative
autoFallback.description: Automatically switch to an iterative flavor if input exceeds context window
autoFallback.noFallbackAvailable: Requires at least one active iterative flavor in this service

fallbackFlavor.label: Fallback Flavor
fallbackFlavor.description: When input exceeds context limit, automatically use this flavor instead

outputTypeHints.abstractive: LLM generates new text summarizing the content
outputTypeHints.extractive: LLM extracts verbatim quotes from input
outputTypeHints.markdown: Formatted with headers, lists, and emphasis

descriptions.description: Optional description for this flavor configuration
descriptions.priority: Higher priority flavors are preferred when multiple match
descriptions.frequencyPenalty: Reduce likelihood of repeating tokens (0.0 to 2.0)
descriptions.presencePenalty: Increase likelihood of new topics (0.0 to 2.0)
descriptions.estimatedCost: Cost in USD per 1000 tokens (used for job cost estimation)
descriptions.maxConcurrentRequests: Maximum number of concurrent requests for this flavor
descriptions.createNewTurnAfter: Token count threshold after which a new turn is created during chunking (100-5000, default: 500)
descriptions.maxNewTurns: Maximum turns to accumulate before triggering summarization batch (1-50, default: 10)
descriptions.summaryTurns: Number of previous summary turns to keep in context for continuity (1-20, default: 3)
descriptions.reduceSummary: Apply reduction step to summaries for further compression
descriptions.consolidateSummary: Merge adjacent speaker turns during summarization
descriptions.tokenizerOverride: Override the default tokenizer for token counting. Leave empty to use model defaults.
descriptions.outputType: How the LLM formats its response

prompts.systemPlaceholder: Enter system prompt that defines the AI's behavior...
prompts.userPlaceholder: Enter user prompt template with placeholders like '{input}'...
prompts.notApplicable: Not applicable for this service type
prompts.reduceHiddenHint: Enable 'Reduce Summary' in the Processing step to configure a reduce prompt

validation.iterativeRequires2: Iterative processing requires exactly 2 placeholders ('{}' for previous summary and '{}' for new content)
validation.selectDifferentPrompt: Please select a different prompt or change the processing mode

flavors.presetsNotApplicable: Presets are not applicable for this service type.
flavors.serviceTypeInfo: This service type has specific prompt requirements.

chunking.title: Chunking Parameters
chunking.createNewTurnAfterDesc: Token threshold for creating new conversation turns (100-5000)
chunking.maxNewTurnsDesc: Maximum turns to process before running a summarization pass
chunking.summaryTurnsDesc: Number of previous summary turns to include for context
chunking.reduceSummaryDesc: Apply the reduce prompt to format the final summary
chunking.consolidateSummaryDesc: Merge adjacent speaker turns during summarization

promptSelector.noPrompts: No prompts available for this category

failoverConfig.title: Failover Configuration
failoverConfig.description: Configure automatic failover to another flavor when processing fails due to errors
failoverConfig.enableDescription: Automatically retry with another flavor when processing errors occur
failoverConfig.maxDepthDescription: Maximum number of failover attempts before giving up (1-10)
failoverConfig.vsFallback: Note: Failover handles processing errors (timeout, rate limit). Fallback (existing) handles context overflow.
failoverConfig.inactiveWarning: Some flavors in the chain are inactive
